ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 60 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 128 ops/tile/clock = 15,360 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 60 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 256 ops/tile/clock = 30,720 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at all_core_boost_mhz (2900 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Sapphire Rapids (4th Gen Xeon). 60 cores with HyperThreading (120 threads). Intel 7 process. AMX (Advanced Matrix Extensions) for INT8/BF16 acceleration. 8-channel DDR5-4800. PCIe 5.0 with 80 lanes. CXL 1.1 support.
